title: Parking / Parking Lot - Parking along with ancillary uses such as public convenience, drivers room, motor garage etc
clause_text: Parking / Parking Lot - Parking along with ancillary uses such as public convenience, drivers room, motor garage etc. on not more than 10% area.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS
